text: Sun Siyin (, born June 6, 1984) is a Chinese former competitive figure skater. She is a four-time (2000–03) Chinese national silver medalist. Her highest placement at an ISU Championship was 11th at the 2003 Four Continents. == Programs == {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Short program !
